Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
application.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
The main game model that manages the game state, player movement, enemy behavior, and game logic for the mining adventure game.

This class serves as the central controller that coordinates between the game map, player (miner), enemies, and the user interface. It handles movement, pathfinding, game timers, win/lose conditions, and callback mechanisms for UI updates.

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    GameModel.Direction
    Represents the four possible movement directions for the player.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(String characterImage, Difficulty difficulty)
      Constructs a new GameModel with the specified character and difficulty.
      Parameters:
      characterImage - the image file name for the player character
      difficulty - the game difficulty level (EASY, MEDIUM, HARD)

  • Method Details

    • moveMiner

      public boolean moveMiner(GameModel.Direction direction)
      Attempts to move the miner in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to move (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)
      Returns:
      true if movement was successful, false if blocked by bounds, non-walkable cell, or enemy

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame(int startRow, int startCol)
      Resets the game to the specified starting position.
      Parameters:
      startRow - the row to place the miner
      startCol - the column to place the miner

    • clearPath

      public void clearPath()
      Clears the current path queue. Used when starting a new drag movement.

    • addToPath

      public void addToPath(int row, int col)
      Adds a cell position to the path queue.
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the cell to add
      col - the column of the cell to add

    • moveAlongPath

      public void moveAlongPath()
      Initiates movement along the queued path. Processes the path queue and moves the miner step by step.

    • collectKey

      public void collectKey(int keyIndex)
      Collects a key and updates game state.
      Parameters:
      keyIndex - the index of the key being collected

    • hasAllKeys

      public boolean hasAllKeys()
      Checks if all required keys have been collected.
      Returns:
      true if all keys are collected, false otherwise

    • checkWinCondition

      public void checkWinCondition()
      Checks and triggers win condition if all keys are collected. Stops game timers and executes win callback.

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()
      Starts the oxygen depletion timer. Reduces miner's oxygen every second and triggers UI updates.

    • setGameStage

      public void setGameStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the game stage reference.
      Parameters:
      stage - the JavaFX stage for the game window

    • openShop

      public void openShop()
      Opens the shop interface. Triggers the shop callback if available.

    • setCallback

      public void setCallback(Runnable callback)
      Sets the callback for general game updates.
      Parameters:
      callback - the runnable to execute on game updates

    • setWinCallback

      public void setWinCallback(Runnable winCallback)
      Sets the callback for win condition.
      Parameters:
      winCallback - the runnable to execute when player wins

    • setLoseCallback

      public void setLoseCallback(Runnable loseCallback)
      Sets the callback for lose condition.
      Parameters:
      loseCallback - the runnable to execute when player loses

    • setGoldCallback

      public void setGoldCallback(Runnable goldCallback)
      Sets the callback for gold changes.
      Parameters:
      goldCallback - the runnable to execute when gold changes

    • setOxygenCallback

      public void setOxygenCallback(Runnable oxygenCallback)
      Sets the callback for oxygen updates.
      Parameters:
      oxygenCallback - the runnable to execute when oxygen changes

    • setShopCallback

      public void setShopCallback(Runnable shopCallback)
      Sets the callback for shop interactions.
      Parameters:
      shopCallback - the runnable to execute when shop is opened

    • setKeyCollectedCallback

      public void setKeyCollectedCallback(Runnable callback)
      Sets the callback for key collection events.
      Parameters:
      callback - the runnable to execute when a key is collected

    • setChestOpenedCallback

      public void setChestOpenedCallback(Runnable callback)
      Sets the callback for chest opening events.
      Parameters:
      callback - the runnable to execute when chest is opened

    • getMap

      public Map getMap()
      Gets the game map.
      Returns:
      the current map instance

    • getMiner

      public Miner getMiner()
      Gets the player miner.
      Returns:
      the miner instance

      public KeyCodeManager getKeyCodeManager()
      Gets the key code manager.
      Returns:
      the key code manager instance

    • isGameWon

      public boolean isGameWon()
      Checks if the game has been won.
      Returns:
      true if game is won, false otherwise

    • getKeysCollected

      public int getKeysCollected()
      Gets the number of keys collected.
      Returns:
      the count of collected keys

    • getTotalKeys

      public int getTotalKeys()
      Gets the total number of keys required to win.
      Returns:
      the total keys needed

    • notifyGoldChanged

      public void notifyGoldChanged()
      Notifies listeners that gold amount has changed. Triggers the gold callback if available.

    • openChest

      public void openChest()
      Opens the final chest and triggers completion events. Executes the chest opened callback if available.
